5.22.16  11:18 pm   Only downside to this question page is I can't keep track of which questions I asked so it's hard to see if you answered them or not. I know I asked you a relatively important question a while back, but I forgot what I asked and it's been a pain trying to find it.

     

     if you take a screenshot before you send it, that way you can see the question, and the time. then when the answers get posted you will know where (when) to find it. the other option would be for me to make everyone enter their email address, but i made the decision long ago that this will not be that kind of website
